web_snippets: Christopher Hamill (born 19 December 1958), known professionally as Limahl is an English pop singer. He was the lead singer of the pop group Kajagoogoo ...
Christopher Hamill, 19 December 1958, Wigan, Lancashire, England Limahl (an anagram of his surname) came to prominence as lead vocalist with Kajagoogoo.
Limahl won the hearts of a global audience as lead singer of Kajagoogoo and co-writer of their million selling album 'White Feathers'.
